name: Flash Step
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Until the end of your turn, every time you would travel 5 feet, you instead transform into a bolt of lightning and dash 30 feet in any direction. Creatures you pass through must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d10 lightning damage. A creature that fails a saving throw from this spell fails all other saving throws from this spell.

A creature can only take damage from this spell four times in one turn.
